title: The Neighbour
description: When Luke is implicated in the tragic death of a child, he struggles to assert his innocence to those around him. While the accident invokes haunting memories of Luke's late brother, who died when they were children, he strives to maintain a grip on reality as his relationships begin to unravel. Set in contemporary suburbia, 'The Neighbour' is an astute psychological drama that offers a powerful and literary meditation on the nature of guilt and responsibility. Winner of the 2014 Viva La Novella prize.
author: Julie Proudfoot
